alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 7:58PM CST until January 21 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet possible. Very cold wind chills possible. Light icing will result in very slippery conditions on sidewalks, with black ice on roads and bridges/flyaways, including during the morning commute on Friday. Wind chills could range from around 20 above zero to 30 above zero. * WHERE...Coastal Kenedy County. * WHEN...12 AM to 12 PM Friday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Residents should continue to closely monitor this developing winter weather situation.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of ice are expected This will make travel very hazardous or impossible. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
